description:
In order to protect their new friend Zatch, Ted and Jido desperately enhance their strength and skills. This surprised Arth. Zatch joins the fight even though he is injured, and he uses the spell of Boa Zakeruga. However, his spell of Boa Zakeruga does not show its real power unexpectedly!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Moonlit Night`s Disturbance! Fist of Friendship! Earth`s One-hit Certain Kill!
Tsukiyo no Douran, Yuujou no Kobushi, Earth Ichigeki Hissatsu!
月夜の動乱 友情の拳 アース一撃必殺!
